about_the_game:
Welcome to FuMetaverso, the ultimate digital playground for creators and streamers! With its innovative technology that connects 3D virtual environments with real-time streaming and chat connectivity, FuMetaverso is a metaverse like no other.

In FuMetaverso, content creators can explore their very own haunted mansion and share it with their audiences. They can play mini-games to keep their viewers entertained, and customize their surroundings with personalized images, sounds, and videos. And with Twitch integration, streamers can easily connect with their chat and receive alerts while in-game.

But FuMetaverso isn't just for creators. Players of all levels can enjoy the unique features of the mansion, and even participate in scavenger hunts, puzzles, and other challenges to unlock rewards and discover hidden secrets.

Join the community today and experience the ultimate digital playground for yourself!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6267U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia™ 1060 6gb
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated sound chip
  • Additional Notes: Needs a webcam with a good resolution and framerate (720p 30fps recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 6700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia™ 2060 8gb
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated sound chip
  • Additional Notes: Needs a webcam with a good resolution and framerate (720p 30fps recommended)
